favourite.article: "Lord there's nothing in this world like You! You fill me up completely! And I would never give You up for anything because nothing else could satisfy me so!!!"
Amen. We praise You Lord. There's nothing like You in this world. You are so precious to us. I love You Lord.
Yes, we found the Best One in the entire universe! [In response to Charis Laylo's comment below]

Thank You Lord that we can turn away from our past failures, and turn unto You! Praise the Lord that everything is part of Your plan and I just need to take You as my full satisfaction! Keep me enjoying You today!
Not all people truly experience this satisfaction, only the genuine Christian does.
Our real satisfaction is not of the material thing that we have been enjoyed or success in our life, “The real satisfaction is the very God Himself.” Hallelujah!
There's nothing you can compare to the Lord. He is just the best thing we can have :)
No more trying something else, Or thinking that there's something more; No more hoping "someday," 'Cause today I have the best... Lord, there's nothing in this world like You =)
Amen, Only the Lord can satisfy us. This song has really touched me.
Such a refreshing song! our Lord is incomparable!
Lord theres nothing in this world like you!your my real SATISFACTION...i really love this song,every time i heard this hymn i remember ate gleceria...we sang this hymn together to the Lord....
I really like this song too!
I like this song because it causes my heart to love only Him.. because He's the only One in this world who can love us like the way He does..
